channel.title: Vapalus 100% all skills working
channel.description:
Welcome to Vapalus, The most prestiege private server yet to hit this toplist. Vapalus is known for our skills, every single skill works, even hunter, summoning and dungeoneering. We have a unique dungeoneering and clan chat system that was coded by our advanced team of developers. Below are a few pictures regarding the server. [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/0DSGff.jpg[/img] [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/sSUkGf.jpg[/img] [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/QRVBMc.jpg[/img] [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/AY3LlJ.jpg[/img] [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/KYMjBQ.jpg[/img] Here is a list of our server features:
Melee - Completely Re-Done Combat System - All special attacks working completely and accuratly - PvP | PvM | NvN system rewrites Magic - Modern/Ancient/Lunar Spellbooks Added - Lunar Spells/Modern Spells only have ones that work well with the server - Re-done combat system - All ancient spells work Ranging - Re-done combat system - Bolt effects / Effect System - Bows/Arrows Working correctly Prayer - Bones on Altar - Bury Bones Mining - Rocks lose the ore after mining it - Prospecting - All rocks included Smithing - Smelting Correctly Implemented - Bronze-Rune Armour smithing Fishing - Net / Bait / Lure / Cage / Harpoon / Big Net (Sea Turtles and Rocktails) - Correct secondary item for fishing when needed Cooking - Ability to cook all food that one can fish - Burning Formula that relates to the cooking level Firemaking - Clipping to the walls - All logs can be burned - Customized Inferno Adze Quest Woodcutting - All trees can be cut down - Formula for trees - all hatchets working with effect in forumla Agility - Gnome Course - Barbarian Course Herblore - All regular potions done - Extremes Makeable - 1 5 10 X All working - Overloads w/Effect Thieving - Pick pocketing with failing - Stalls thievable - Not the main source of money in a server Farming - All Herb Seeds / Watering / Raking Crafting - Tanning - Leather / Hard Leather - All Dragonhide Fletching look in media Slayer - Slayer Tasks/ Shop - Much better system, (70-150 per task) - Slayer Tower Runecrafting - All altars - Tiara activating - Multiple Runes Hunter - Butterfly's - Imps (Not much to hunter) Summoning - Look In Media Dungeoneering - 5 Floors - 4 Complexities for Each Floor - All dungeoneering items/Armour bindable - A Boss per Floor (With Special (Custom)) - 120 Dungeoneering Max Level, with Formula - Formula for dungeoneerng XP - Tokens received is 10 times less than xp received. - Working Tab Interface - Leave/Abandon Working on Logout/DC/On Command - Shop rewards in tokens are nothing more than regular shop rewards (no primal OP stuff)
Minigames and Bosses:
Godwars - All 4 Bosses - 30 KC requirement - Bosses with minions and effects Corp Beast - Different Types of Attacks - 2k HP, 65 mage max hit, 50 melee max hit Tormented Demons - Prayers For Player - Multi Attacks Dagonnoth Kings - All 3 with effects - Magic Creatures on Sides - Correct Maps To Get There Nex (Donor Only) - 5 Stages - 4 Minions - Correct Dialogue, and Special Effects Barrows - All 6 Brothers - Tunnel - Correct Chest loots - Tunnel Rocks at end Fight Caves - 63 Wave Fight Cave Fight Pits - Working fight pits w/Tokkul reward - Cool free for all minigame Pest Control - Basic NPC spawning - All 4 Portals - Void Rewards Duel Arena - Working dueling 100% - No Dupes/Bugs Etc....

item.title: Vapalus 100% all skills working
item.dc:creator: @Vapalus Vapalus
item.description:
@Vapalus wrote:

Welcome to Vapalus, The most prestiege private server yet to hit this toplist.
Vapalus is known for our skills, every single skill works, even hunter, summoning and dungeoneering.

We have a unique dungeoneering and clan chat system that was coded by our advanced team of developers.

Below are a few pictures regarding the server.




Here is a list of our server features:

Melee - Completely Re-Done Combat System - All special attacks working completely and accuratly - PvP | PvM | NvN system rewrites

Magic

  • Modern/Ancient/Lunar Spellbooks Added
  • Lunar Spells/Modern Spells only have ones that work well with the server
  • Re-done combat system
  • All ancient spells work

Ranging

  • Re-done combat system
  • Bolt effects / Effect System
  • Bows/Arrows Working correctly

Prayer

  • Bones on Altar
  • Bury Bones

Mining

  • Rocks lose the ore after mining it
  • Prospecting
  • All rocks included

Smithing

  • Smelting Correctly Implemented
  • Bronze-Rune Armour smithing

Fishing

  • Net / Bait / Lure / Cage / Harpoon / Big Net (Sea Turtles and Rocktails)
  • Correct secondary item for fishing when needed

Cooking

  • Ability to cook all food that one can fish
  • Burning Formula that relates to the cooking level

Firemaking

  • Clipping to the walls
  • All logs can be burned
  • Customized Inferno Adze Quest

Woodcutting

  • All trees can be cut down
  • Formula for trees
  • all hatchets working with effect in forumla

Agility

  • Gnome Course
  • Barbarian Course

Herblore

  • All regular potions done
  • Extremes Makeable
  • 1 5 10 X All working
  • Overloads w/Effect

Thieving

  • Pick pocketing with failing
  • Stalls thievable
  • Not the main source of money in a server

Farming

  • All Herb Seeds / Watering / Raking

Crafting

  • Tanning
  • Leather / Hard Leather
  • All Dragonhide

Fletching
look in media

Slayer

  • Slayer Tasks/ Shop
  • Much better system, (70-150 per task)
  • Slayer Tower

Runecrafting

  • All altars
  • Tiara activating
  • Multiple Runes

Hunter

  • Butterfly’s
  • Imps (Not much to hunter)

Summoning

  • Look In Media

Dungeoneering

  • 5 Floors
  • 4 Complexities for Each Floor
  • All dungeoneering items/Armour bindable
  • A Boss per Floor (With Special (Custom))
  • 120 Dungeoneering Max Level, with Formula
  • Formula for dungeoneerng XP
  • Tokens received is 10 times less than xp received.
  • Working Tab Interface
  • Leave/Abandon Working on Logout/DC/On Command
  • Shop rewards in tokens are nothing more than regular shop rewards (no primal OP stuff)

Minigames and Bosses:

Godwars - All 4 Bosses - 30 KC requirement - Bosses with minions and effects

Corp Beast

  • Different Types of Attacks
  • 2k HP, 65 mage max hit, 50 melee max hit

Tormented Demons

  • Prayers For Player
  • Multi Attacks

Dagonnoth Kings

  • All 3 with effects
  • Magic Creatures on Sides
  • Correct Maps To Get There

Nex (Donor Only)

  • 5 Stages
  • 4 Minions
  • Correct Dialogue, and Special Effects

Barrows

  • All 6 Brothers
  • Tunnel
  • Correct Chest loots
  • Tunnel Rocks at end

Fight Caves

  • 63 Wave Fight Cave

Fight Pits

  • Working fight pits w/Tokkul reward
  • Cool free for all minigame

Pest Control

  • Basic NPC spawning
  • All 4 Portals
  • Void Rewards

Duel Arena

  • Working dueling 100%
  • No Dupes/Bugs Etc…

Read full topic
